intro: Dufrenoya heterantha, commonly known as the slender thornapple, is a flowering plant native to South America. It belongs to the family Solanaceae, which includes nightshades, and is characterized by its branched stems and hairy leaves. Due to its ornamental value and potential medicinal properties, it is occasionally cultivated in gardens.
